page.title: 08TOURISM
page.content: Our block is not a holiday centre itself,but is close to the resorts of Looe and Polperro where there are 7 large holiday camps and many guests houses and hotels. The influx of visitors has an effect on local life - prices are high,car parking is difficult,heavy traffic on inadequate roads slows movement especially for commercial vehicles, restrictions are often put on water supplies,petty crime increases etc. Few Pelynt people work in the industry(8%) although many teenagers work on a casual basis.There are 16 holiday flats or houses in the village but few B&B's. A traffic count between 11-12a.m each day in the 3rd week of July showed 198 vehicles from Looe,233 to Looe.This compares with 76 from Looe and 59 to Looe in November,1982.
